On over nine acres, accessed by its own street, this one-of-a-kind property took over seven year to create. Expansive gates open to a 30 car courtyard surrounded by 40 foot tall Canary Island palms and a setting worthy of the best Italian palazzo. Inside the mansion, approximately 20,000 square feet afford every possible amenity from high ceilings to large and formal gathering areas to small and intimate spaces. A four plus acre backyard offers views to a pool with pool house, two-story guesthouse, tennis court, two bedroom guest house and a walking/jogging trail that surrounds the estate.
